string.text: Mangun is able to do basic upgrades to your equipment if you bring him his gunsmith tools.

Hey man, I could do some upgrades to your gear if you like. If you're interested, I have a set of gunsmith tools stashed away not too far from here. If you want to get them for me, I'll give you some cash and I'll be able to do some basic upgrades to your equipment.
Thanks man, here's something for your trouble. Stop by anytime if you want me to upgrade your gear.
A Bandit borrowed a set of technician tools from Mangun and is refusing to give them back. Recover the stolen property from the Bandit.
Wish I could do some better upgrades for you, but I loaned my set of technician tools to a guy a while ago and he never gave them back. I knew I shouldn't have trusted a Bandit.
Where is he now? I'll get your tools back. I can be very persuasive.
Hey man, that would be awesome. I'll mark his location on your map. If you can convince him to give me my tools back I'll pay you and I can do some better upgrades to your gear.
Hey, great! Thanks for getting my tools back. Let me know if you want any advanced upgrades done to your gear, I'll be able to do them now.
Find a set of armorer's tools for Mangun so he can fully upgrade your equipment.

I'm pretty much at the limit of what I can do for your gear with the tools I currently have. If you want me to be able to fully upgrade your equipment I will need a set of armorer's tools. I don't know anyone who has any, but I do know a place you might be able to find some if you're willing to search for them.
Yes! These are just what I needed. I'll be able to do pretty much any equipment upgrades for you now. Thanks for bringing me these, stalker.
